articles.title: Truist announces fourth quarter 2025 earnings call details
articles.mainIdea: Truist announces fourth quarter 2025 earnings call details
articles.summary: PR Newswire: Truist announces fourth quarter 2025 earnings call details. Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) will report fourth quarter 2025 financial results before the market opens on Wednesday, January 21, 2026. Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Bill Rogers and Chief Financial Officer Mike Maguire will host a conference call to review the company's financial results at 8 a.m. ET.

articles.title: Tracking the Evolving Cummins Narrative After Shifting Analyst Views
articles.mainIdea: Tracking the Evolving Cummins Narrative After Shifting Analyst Views
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Tracking the Evolving Cummins Narrative After Shifting Analyst Views. Cummins stock has seen a modest uptick in its fair value estimate to about $532 per share as analysts grow more confident in the durability of earnings and the long term boost from data center power demand. A slightly lower discount rate and essentially unchanged revenue growth assumptions together signal a fine tuning of expectations rather than a wholesale rethink of the story. Stay tuned to see how you can track these subtle but important narrative shifts as they unfold over time. Analyst... Related tickers mentioned: CMI, WFC.
